welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Smethwick, United Kingdom! This charming city is known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Smethwick has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, with a limit of 2 hours per device.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport is the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
